name: Extricator
overview: You have been transferred to the surface of the Planet Arg. Your mission is to infiltrate the aliens star fleet command base, where Professor Roberts is being held captive, There is more than one sector you will need to pass through before you will come to the cell block, each of which has its own problems to be solved before you will be able to go forward to the next. Developed by Peter, Caff, David, and Sean and published in Commodore Force #05 (May 1993) - Reel Action #10
